title: Studies of Mount Chimborazo, Ecuador
medium: Brush and oil paint, graphite, on thin paper laminate
description: Four studies of Mount Chimborazo: top peak, rising in background over clouds and rest of mountain range; lower foreground, snow-covered peak surrounded by clouds and sky; bottom right, two adjacent studies framed by graphite lines. Bottom study, ochre colored foreground with mountainous landscape and green fields.
name: Drawing
